reviewText: What a great story of recovery!  I would change the name to Brave Woman however. What a role model for everyone.
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland

reviewText: I always admire a woman who, when down and out, has the gumption to pick herself up and improve not only her own life but that of family members.  This holds true not only for our Native Americans but for all women everywhere.  There is always a way to get help and if one needs it, get it!  Never could understand how a person can allow themself to become addicted to alcohol, tobacco, or anything else but so be it.  It happens.
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland

reviewText: This is a truly inspiring story.  I would strongly recommend it to everyone, especially women and teenagers who are living in difficult times.
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland

reviewText: It's very depressing and only if you need to have a good crying fit is it worth watching. It's like a reality show for abused women, sorry I don't want to be reminded constantly of social miseries of the continually oppressed when nothing is being done about it.
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland

reviewText: I really enjoyed this movie, it is full of so many ups and downs for this wonderful women, she over comes so much. It gives hope to others not to give up, I think this is a movie for all women to see.
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland

reviewText: This was a must see for me. I feel compelled to share this story with everyone that I know. I recommend it to everyone.
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland

reviewText: This movie three years in the making follows Robin Charbonneau and her family.  At 3 years of age she was raped and over many years as a child was molested.  She is a re-covering alcoholic and is trying to rebuild her life.  You follow her as mistakes are made and different paths are taken.  She tries to rebuild her relationship with her 2 charming children and make a better life for them.  I cheered for her to make her life better for herself and her children I really want her to succeed.  This is a series not to be missed .
Title: Kind Hearted Woman: Film By David Sutherland
